member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Providers.Embedly.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates the object (without using an internet proxy)

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Providers.Embedly.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates the object (using an internet proxy)
member.param: String - the URL of a proxy server to use for oEmbed requests
Integer - the http port to use for the proxy server

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Providers.Embedly.GetRichContent(System.String)
member.summary: GetRichContentObject - this method will return the rich content to be embedded into your content
member.param: The source URL of the image. Consumers should be able to insert this URL into an element. Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are valid.

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Providers.Embedly.GetRichContentObject(System.String)
member.summary: GetRichContentObject - this method will return the rich content oEmbed object that is returned from the provider
member.param: The source URL of the image. Consumers should be able to insert this URL into an element. Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are valid.

member.name: T:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Providers.Embedly
member.summary: This is the implementation wrapper for the Embed.Ly oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo.Format
member.summary: The required response format. When not specified, the provider can return any valid response format. When specified, the provider must return data in the request format, else return an error.
member.remarks:
ReadOnly. This API only supports JSON requests and responses at this time.
If there was an error, instead of the specified formatted content, oEmbed providers may return the following errors: 404 Not Found, 501 Not Implemented, 401 Not Authorized

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo.MaxHeight
member.summary: The maximum height of the embedded resource. For supported resource types, this parameter must be respected by providers.
member.remarks: Required to be sent for video and photo oEmbed types.

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo.MaxWidth
member.summary: The maximum width of the embedded resource. For supported resource types, this parameter must be respected by providers.
member.remarks: Required to be sent for video and photo oEmbed types.

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo.URL
member.summary: The URL to retrieve embedding information for.

member.name: T:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo
member.summary: This is the request object used to generate generic requests to oEmbed providers that are not included in this API.

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestController.GetOEmbedContent(System.String)
member.summary: GetOEmbedContent - this method makes a GET request to the oEmbed provider, and returns their response.
member.param: String - this is the oEmbed formatted URL to call
member.remarks: If an error occurs, the error message will be returned in the "title" parameter of the oEmbed object.

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestController.GetOEmbedContent(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetOEmbedContent - this method makes a GET request to the oEmbed provider, and returns their response.
member.param: String - this is the oEmbed formatted URL to call
String - this is the URL for the internet proxy to use for the oEmbed request
Integer - this is the http port for the internet proxy to use for the oEmbed request
member.remarks: If an error occurs, the error message will be returned in the "title" parameter of the oEmbed object.

member.name: T:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestController
member.summary: RequestController - this class handles all of the remote GET requests centrally for all oEmbed types.
member.remarks: This class is not inheritable.

member.remarks: Look in the "title" parameter of the oEmbed object to see the error.

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Wrapper.GetPhotoContent(System.String,WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo)
member.summary: GetPhotoContent - this method makes a call to a photo oEmbed provider, and returns the image URL that you request
member.param: String - the endpoint as specified by the oEmbed provider
RequestInfo - the request object required to pass information into the EndPoint URL
member.returns: String - the image URL to embed into your content

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Wrapper.GetPhotoContent(System.String,WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo,System.String[])
member.summary: GetPhotoContent - this method makes a call to a photo oEmbed provider, and returns the image URL that you request
member.param: String - the endpoint as specified by the oEmbed provider
RequestInfo - the request object required to pass information into the EndPoint URL
String() - optional arguments that can be appended to the end of the oEmbed GET request URL
member.returns: String - the image URL to embed into your content

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Wrapper.GetVideoContent(System.String,WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo)
member.summary: GetVideoContent - this method makes a call to a video oEmbed provider, and returns the video markup that you request
member.param: String - the endpoint as specified by the oEmbed provider
RequestInfo - the request object required to pass information into the EndPoint URL
member.returns: String - the video markup to embed into your content

RequestInfo - the request object required to pass information into the EndPoint URL
String() - optional arguments that can be appended to the end of the oEmbed GET request URL
member.returns: String - the video markup to embed into your content

member.summary: GetRichContent - this method makes a call to a rich content oEmbed provider, and returns the rich content markup that you request

String() - optional arguments that can be appended to the end of the oEmbed GET request URL

member.name: M:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Wrapper.GetParsedURL(System.String,WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.RequestInfo,System.String[])
member.summary: GetParsedURL - this method parses the URL and makes the necessary updates to the URL to make it oEmbed compatible.
member.param: String - the endpoint as specified by the oEmbed provider
RequestInfo - the request object required to pass information into the EndPoint URL
String() - optional arguments that can be appended to the end of the oEmbed GET request URL
member.remarks: If you use the Args() argument, you need to specify it in the following format: Args = {"&arg1=value1&arg2=value2&arg3=value3"}

member.name: T:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.Wrapper
member.summary: Wrapper - this is the main class to use for any provider that is not provided in this API.

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.AuthorName
member.summary: The name of the author/owner of the resource.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.AuthorUrl
member.summary: A URL for the author/owner of the resource.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.CacheAge
member.summary: The suggested cache lifetime for this resource, in seconds. Consumers may choose to use this value or not.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.ProviderName
member.summary: The name of the resource provider.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.ProviderUrl
member.summary: A URL for the author/owner of the resource.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.ThumbnailHeight
member.summary: The height of the optional thumbnail. If this paramater is present, thumbnail_url and thumbnail_width must also be present.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.ThumbnailUrl
member.summary: A URL to a thumbnail image representing the resource. The thumbnail must respect any maxwidth and maxheight parameters. If this paramater is present, thumbnail_width and thumbnail_height must also be present.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.ThumbnailWidth
member.summary: The width of the optional thumbnail. If this paramater is present, thumbnail_url and thumbnail_height must also be present.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.Title
member.summary: A text title, describing the resource.
member.remarks: Optionally returned by the oEmbed provider

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.Type
member.summary: The resource type.
member.remarks: Valid values are photo, video, link, and rich

member.name: P:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo.Version
member.summary: The oEmbed version number. This must be 1.0.

member.name: T:WillStrohl.API.oEmbed.oEmbedInfo
member.summary: oEmbedInfo - this is the base oEmbed response object that contains all of the universal oEmbed properties
